Title: Provides for family members of a crime victim and interested parties to make statements to members of the parole board
Summary: Provides for family members of a crime victim and interested parties to make statements to members of the parole board; provides that such oral statement shall be made to the members of the state board of parole who will determine whether the defendant is released.
LawCode: Amd ยง440.50, CP L; amd ยง259-i, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the executive law, in relation to requiring that all family members of a crime victim and all interested parties who want to give a victim impact statement to parole board members be allowed to do so
